item.title: Empty Mind
item.description: Focus on the line It will disappear in time Ride the spring in life

item.title: Drive
item.description: Sunshine in the east. A storm brewing to the west. Take the scenic route. It was one of those days, there was traffic on Dillon, more than I expected. It was a good thing; I got to spend more than ten minutes watching the world change as the weather front moved in over the front range.
